description: Alexis is one of the amazing kreatives of KND. He has over 4 years of design experience and is currently creating design solutions as a freelancer. Want to know more about Andikan? Follow his socials!
Maria is a dedicated leader with over 5 years of experience in project management. She excels in coordinating teams and driving projects to success.
Carlos is an organized and efficient secretary with over 3 years of experience in administrative roles. He ensures that all organizational activities run smoothly.
Luisa is a meticulous treasurer with a knack for numbers and over 6 years of experience in finance. She manages the organization's funds with utmost precision.
Juan is a tech-savvy CTO with over 8 years of experience in IT and software development. He leads the technological innovations within the organization.
Ana is a creative CMO with a background in digital marketing and over 7 years of experience. She is responsible for the organization's marketing strategies and campaigns.
